lines.dialogueText: Ah, the market’s full today. But a wise peddler doesn’t just set up anywhere.
Location is coin. Stand where the footfalls are loudest and needs are sharpest.
I once sold blankets near a forge—poor thinking! But near the mountains? I sold out by dusk.
Keep your eyes open. What are people talking about? What do they lack?
The market changes like the wind. Adapt or be left behind, friend.
